key_risks: Market volatility due to cyclical housing market dependence
Supply chain disruptions and inflationary pressures
Regulatory and legal exposure from environmental and labor disputes
controversies: Allegations of unfair labor practices under the National Labor Relations Act
environmental_issues: Violations of the Clean Air Act and emissions-related legal challenges
Scrutiny over deforestation and sustainable sourcing practices
social_issues: Workplace culture concerns due to racial discrimination allegations
Labor disputes and employee relations challenges

sources.title: Louisiana-Pacific - Wikipedia
sources.snippet: Louisiana-Pacific Corporation (LP) is an American building materials manufacturer.The company was founded in 1973 and LP pioneered the U.S. production of oriented strand board (OSB) panels. sources.title: Louisiana-Pacific Settles Race Bias Suit With Former Workers (1)
sources.snippet: Louisiana-Pacific Corp. settled a discrimination lawsuit brought by two Black employees who said their terminations were motivated by race and that managers employed White supremacists. The US District Court for the Southern District of Alabama dismissed the lawsuit on Thursday after the building materials manufacturer notified Chief Judge Jeffrey U. Beaverstock that the parties had settled.
